Abuse exemption percentile is currently disabled. </resource> <resource name="Unknown">The status of moderation is not yet known.</resource> <resource name="Widget-Description">Moderation Indicator</resource> <resource name="Widget-Title">Moderation</resource> <resource name="WithinThreshold">Moderation is healthy. There are {exemptedmembercount} abuse exempted members and {recentmembercount} members have visited the community recently.</resource> </language>
